          <title>

            <string language="en">wallpicture painting </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">wallpicture Anstrich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">peinture de wallpicture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pintura do wallpicture</string>

            <string language="hu">A falképfestészet anyagai, módszere, tisztítása</string>

          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">falképfestészet,  secco,  giornata,  Michelangelo Buonarroti,  szinópia,  Castagno, Andrea del,  </string>
            <string language="en">wall-picture painting, secco, giornata, Michelangelo Buonaroti, synopsis, Castango, Andrea del</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>

wallpicture</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">materiales, métodos, limpieza de la pintura del 
wallpicture</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
